startTCR_text: Is the initial temperature of the rod non-uniform at the initial moment?
find_Out_Variables_text:
Please enter the length L, thermal conductivity coefficient alpha, time t, initial temperature at one end T_fixed_0, initial temperature at the other end T_fixed_1, number of nodes in space (accuracy in space) Nx, and number of nodes over time (accuracy in time) Nt.
Please write this as shown in the example. If you have non-integer values, use a dot.
